text: The municipality of Hirtstein in Saxony, Germany was formed on 1 January 1994 from the hitherto separate municipalities of Rübenau, Reitzenhain, Kühnhaide and Satzung.Gebietsänderungen ab 1. Januar 1994 bis 31. Dezember 1994, Statistisches Landesamt des Freistaats Sachsen, p. 11 (PDF; 64 kB), retrieved 02 July 2015 Its administrative seat was Reitzenhain. The Hirtstein mountain near Satzung lent its name to the new municipality. Beginning on 1 January 2000, Hirtstein formed an administrative cooperation with the neighbouring town Marienberg. The merger with Marienberg was agreed upon on 24 June 2002 and became effective on 1 January 2003 when the constituents of Hirtstein became subdivisions of Marienberg.Gebietsänderungen ab 1. Januar 2003 bis 31. Dezember 2003, Statistisches Landesamt des Freistaats Sachsen, p. 1 (PDF; 13 kB), retrieved 02 July 2015Bekanntmachung des Landratsamtes Mittlerer Erzgebirgskreis über die Eingliederung der Gemeinde Hirtstein in die Stadt Marienberg vom 8. November 2002, Sächsisches Amtsblatt No. 50/2002, p. 1251, retrieved 02 July 2015. ==References== Category:Marienberg Category:Villages in the Ore Mountains Category:Erzgebirgskreis
title: Hirtstein (municipality)
